root.name: del

example.code: a = [1,2,3] println(a) # Prints: [1,2,3] del a[0] # Delete the list member at index 0. println(a) # Prints: [2, 3] del a # Delete the variable 'a'

root.description: Remove an item from a list given its index, or delete entire variables.

parameter.label: a
parameter.description: list to delete from or variable to delete

parameter.label: i
parameter.description: index of list member to delete
